message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $22,000. I believe it offers tremendous value, even at this price point, and I'd love for you to be the first to take advantage of it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $16,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $12,000?
